field.name: CPWMS
field.description: Centre-Aligned PWM Select\n Selects between left and centre-aligned PWM pulse output

field.name: TOIE
field.description: Timer Overflow Interrupt Enable\n An interrupt is generated when TOF equals one

field.name: ICRST
field.description: FTM counter reset by the selected input capture event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM counter is not reset when the selected channel input event is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM counter is reset when the selected channel input event is detected

field.name: ELS
field.description: Edge or Level Select\n Determine edge sensitivity of IC or output action of OC and pulse polarity of PWM\n Edge sensitivity/Output polarity/Pulse polarity

field.name: MS
field.description: Channel Mode Select\n Determines Input Capture, Output Compare & Pulse Width Modulation

field.name: CHF
field.description: Channel Flag\nSet when a channel event occurs

field.name: INIT
field.description: Initial Value of the FTM Counter

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TPM registers only\t (first set of registers) can be used without any restriction. Do not use the FTM-specific

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: All registers\t including the FTM-specific registers (second set of registers) are available for use with no restrictions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No restrictions.\t Software and hardware triggers can be used by MOD, CnV, OUTMASK, and FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Restricted\t Software trigger can only be used by MOD and CnV synchronization, and hardware triggers can only be used by OUTMASK and FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Even channels with manual fault clearing

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: All channels with manual fault clearing

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: All channels with automatic fault clearing

field.name: REINIT
field.description: FTM Counter Reinitialization by Synchronization (FTM Counter Synchronization)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Updated with initial value on triggerd

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Rising edges of the system clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Masked\tChannel output is forced to its inactive state

field.name: COMP0
field.description: Complement for Channels 0 & 1\n Controls whether channels are the some or complement

field.name: DECAPEN0
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable for Channels 0 & 1

field.name: DECAP0
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures for Channel 0 & 1

field.name: DECAPEN1
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable for Channels 2 & 3

field.name: DECAP1
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures for Channel 2 & 3

field.name: DECAPEN2
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable for Channels 4 & 5

field.name: DECAP2
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures for Channels 4 & 5

field.name: DECAPEN3
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable for Channels 6 & 7

field.name: DECAP3
field.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures for Channels 6 & 7

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disabled\t Generation of initialization trigger disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enabled\t Generation of initialization trigger enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Unprotected\t Write protected bits can be written

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Protected\t Write protected bits cannot be written

field.name: FFVAL
field.description: Fault Input Filter\nSelects the filter value for the fault inputs

field.name: BDMMODE
field.description: Controls operation in BDM Mode\n Selects the ratio between the number of counter overflows to the number of times the TOF bit is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Stopped, outputs forced to safe value

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Active high\tA one at the fault input indicates a fault

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Active low\tA zero at the fault input indicates a fault

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: TRIGj cleared when trigger j detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Updated on rising edges of system clock

field.name: SWRSTCNT
field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by the software trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger does not activate the FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger activates the FTM counter synchronization

field.name: SWWRBUF
field.description: MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by the software trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger does not activate MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger activates MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization

field.name: SWOM
field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by the software trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger does not activate the OUTMASK register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger activates the OUTMASK register synchronization

field.name: SWINVC
field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by the software trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger does not activate the INVCTRL register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger activates the INVCTRL register synchronization

field.name: SWSOC
field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by the software trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger does not activate the SWOCTRL register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The software trigger activates the SWOCTRL register synchronization

field.name: HWRSTCNT
field.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the FTM counter synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger activates the FTM counter synchronization

field.name: HWWRBUF
field.description: MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger does not activate MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger activates MOD, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization

field.name: HWOM
field.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the OUTMASK register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger activates the OUTMASK register synchronization

field.name: HWINVC
field.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the INVCTRL register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger activates the INVCTRL register synchronization

field.name: HWSOC
field.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger does not activate the SWOCTRL register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: A hardware trigger activates the SWOCTRL register synchronization

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Do not include channel in the matching process

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Include channel in the matching process
